| (____)|| |   | || |   | |   | |     | (__    | |   | || (____)|| |      | (__    
|     __)| |   | || |   | |   | |     |  __)   | |   | ||     __)| |      |  __)   
| (\ (   | |   | || |   | |   | |     | (      | |   | || (\ (   | |      | (      
| ) \ \__| (___) || (___) |   | |     | )      | (___) || ) \ \__| (____/\| (____/\
|/   \__/(_______)(_______)   )_(     |/       (_______)|/   \__/(_______/(_______/

KNOWN ISSUES
-No AMD support
-GUI delay on Nvidia Kepler cards

CONTROLS
-WASD: Move character
-Space: Jump (Hold space to jump higher)
-Shift: Pick up ability
-1,2,3: Select ability
-Q: Cycle abilities
-Mouse button 4 & 5: Cycle abilities
-ESC: In-game menu
-RMB: Activate push ability
-LMB: Activate selected ability
-Enter: Chat
-F12: Toggle GUI

OTHER INFO
-Map and Ability pack must be selected before hosting a level
